pages.text: Basically everything in this dimension wants to kill you. In order to protect yourself, you should seek a shelter as soon as possible. But you cannot just break trees in this dimension because the wood is much harder.$(br2)Try to find some Pebbles on the ground and combine them with sticks which you can get from weedwood bushes in order to craft a simple axe.
Use this axe to get some weedwood so that you can craft better tools. Weedwood trees are also perfect for creating primitive shelters where you can survive.

After building a shelter, you need a way to store your items and tools. You can use Weedwood Chests or Cabinets in the beginning and upgrade them later using Syrmorite or other materials.$(br2)You should also craft some Weedwood Tools so that you don't have to use primitive axes anymore and can start mining.
